name: Ensim Corporation
overview: Founded in 1998, Ensim is the leading provider of solutions to manage and automate private and public cloud; user entitlement, provisioning, billing, and customer support, for wide variety of applications and services. Technologies including unified communications (UC), virtual desktops and servers, hosted cloud applications (SaaS), email, instant messaging, VoIP, collaboration, database, and website hosting environments can be subscribed, provisioned, automated, secured, compliant, self-managed, invoiced, and policy controlled with Ensim products that easily overlay, interface, and extend existing infrastructure. Ensim boasts nearly 3,000,000 users and over 20,000 small, medium, and large sized organizations managed by the Service Provider, SaaS, MSP, Enterprise, and Cloud Manager versions of the solution through their network of Telco, ISP, MSP and VAR partners.
